titles.title: Transparency in Student Lending Act
Transparency in Student Lending Act
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the disclosure of the annual percentage rates applicable to Federal student loans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Transparency in Student Lending Act
This bill requires an institution of higher education to disclose, prior to disbursement, the annual percentage rate applicable to a federal student loan.
